nodes.text: The Blackfel system was a star system located in the Greater Plooriod sector of the galaxy's Expansion Region and Northern Dependencies that contained Blackfel, an Imperial training moon. Circa the year 1 BBY, the bounty hunter Boba Fett ran the Imperial patrol in orbit over Blackfel, which consisted of at least four Imperial-class Star Destroyers, aboard the shuttle Fallon to reach the moon's surface.

The Blackfel system first appeared without identification in Blood Ties: Boba Fett is Dead 2, a 2012 Star Wars Legends comic written by Tom Taylor and pencilled by Chris Scalf. It was first identified in The Essential Atlas Online Companion, which placed the system in grid square M-7.
